markdownRemark.html:
If you’re looking for info on Darren Beattie, you’ve come to the right place. Check out my work history on LinkedIn.

One of the skills I’m presently learning more about, is web design, and there is no better way to learn than by doing. You can check out my web development work and progress on GitHub.

Follow me on Twitter and Quora.

You can also check out my online coaching business Fitnack, and my fitness blog Skill Based Fitness. Join the Skill Based Fitness Facebook Group or the Skill Based Fitness Quora Space.

I’ll be posting here much more infrequently than other places, and most of my discussion will be personal life lessons, business strategy/discussion and web development/coding.

Please bear with me while I get this new website set up. Please refer to my other sites in the meantime and check back here in the coming weeks/months while I start to write new musings on things not related to fitness or weight loss here.

frontmatter.title: Bonjour!
frontmatter.description: My first post on this new darrenbeattie.com blog. Mostly just announcing I'm here and what I plan to do with this URL.
